121322.title: What else?

choices: She grows quite a bit (4-6 inches)
1213221.content: The sun was shining through Lucy's bedroom window as she woke up, still groggy from last night's quest with the gang. As she got out of bed, Lucy felt like her night shirt was a little off. The shirt used to come past her knees, now it only comes up about mid thigh. "Huh, that's strange," Lucy pondered, "Did my shirt shrink or something?" She went to her closet to find clothes for the day, removing her shirt in the process. Lucy then her breasts felt a lot more tender for some odd reason. "Hmm, that's weird too," Lucy said while grabbing one of her bras to wear. She tried to put it on when her bra was uncomfortablely snug on her chest. "Wait? Are my boobs bigger? That can't be?" Lucy adjusted her bra to see if it's just the garment causing the problem. When it was a bit more comfortable, Lucy grabbed an white tank top to wear. The top would fit her just right, but when Lucy pulled it on, the top stopped above her belly button. She kept trying to pull it down but with no success. "Why doesn't this fit me anymore!? Did all my clothes shrink or maybe-" Lucy stopped mid sentence when she felt a shiver throughout her body.
1213221.title: Just a "normal" day

124.content: what kind of story should Juvia the water wizard go through?
124.title: Juvia

1241.content:
Juvia has excepted a request to explore a mysterious labyrinth.
Does Juvia go there by herself or go with some friends?
1241.title: story 1

12413.content:
Juvia was scanning the bulletin board for jobs when she stumbled upon a quest that piqued her interest.

"Hmm a woman went missing in a labyrinth a week ago.. Big reward if found and returned. This sounds perfect." Juvia proclaimed as she read the paper.

"Thou I shouldn't go alone. Oh this would've been the perfect opportunity to go on a mission with Gray!" Juvia cried out whilst envisioning Gray accompanying her. "But he's already out on another mission with his friends." Juvia uttered dejectedly.

Wendy overhearing Juvia's wailing walked over "Hey Juvia if you need company I could help." Wendy sheepishly offered.

"Why thank you Wendy I appreciate that." Juvia kindly responded.

"You two going on a mission? Mind if I tag along?"

"Cana! Why of course you can come along." Juvia replied.

"Great, feels like I haven't been out on a mission in a while. Honestly I think I'm getting kndof fat hehe." Cana added.

"Oh well uh..." Juvia stammered unable to respond to Cana's words. "Well Let's go then."

The three girls then ventured out to the labyrinth in search of a missing woman. The three thougght nothing of this mission, a simple exploration and they'd find the woman, and with their powers they carried no concern. As they walked Juvia exhibited her typical behavior of obssessing over her crush.

"So Wendy, you work with Gray occasionally right? Does he ever talk about me? Could you tell me what he's into?" Juvia inquired.

"Um I wouldn't really know." Wendy spoke intimidated by Juvia's persistance.

"But you have to know! What does he think of me? How many babies does he want? A successful relationship demands that both partners know each other." Juvia said grabbing Wendy who couldn't respond out of fear.

"Calm down Juvia, look you got to relax, I'm sure you'll get the boy sooner or later." advised Cana successfully placating the situation.

"Here we are." Juvia said as they reached the labyrinth.

The three entered the labyrinth and ventured deep into the maze. As they traveled further inside they noticed...
12413.title: goes with Cana and Wendy

125122.content: Following a humiliating defeat at GMG, Lisanna is forced to live for several months at Mermaid Heel, where she will have to be the kind, docile and plump 'kitten' of Millianna.
125122.title: The 'kitten' of Millianna

info.brief_description: Watch as girls(and guys) from Fairy tail get bigger in many different ways
info.description:
As you can see, you can choose which characters to fatten up/expand/inflate/impregnate/etc in this interactive. Create a story and follow through with it and what not. Here are the rules.

Allowed:
Weight gain
pregnancy and Unbirth(girls only)
inflation(by water, other means, or worms is up to you)
body expansion(breast, butt, belly)
Vore
Sex is okay, but lead up to it please.

Not allowed:
toilet play(scat and what not)
Sudden weight gain(example: Lucy suddenly gained 50,000 ls overnight! or Erza is soo fat her flab is like an ocean! and she's the size of the moon!)

Other than that, it's all free game. You can choose Fairy Tail people and any one else from other guilds(as well as antagonists) Enjoy!
